channel.title: Is it possible to turn invisible?
channel.description: Is it any way possible to type in a command, such has :: invisible, and then have a puff of smoke (you know, like when the random events appear), then you're character be invisible? If so, how? This would be perfect for my server. Oh and the smoke would look nice on all the :: commands, so how would you make it so when you type in a command the smoke appears after you type in any command? (The second question is pretty much the same as the first, but on the first question I want to know the combination, and on the second I only want one part).[br][size=1]Posted on: May 18, 2007, 02:55:57 PM[/size][hr]Gosh, this place is DEAD! NO ONE FRICKING REPLIES!

item.title: Is it possible to turn invisible?

item.description:

Hehe mins a command. And its got a giant whirlpool

item.description:
@planplan wrote:

::pnpc 0135 (just to trun inv normal) with no smoke or any gfx

item.title: Is it possible to turn invisible?
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Here’s a commnd for it.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("invisible")) stillgfx(59, absY-1, absX); stillgfx(59, absY, absX+1); stillgfx(59, absY+1, absX); stillgfx(59, absY, absX-1); npcId = 2309; isNpc = true; } }

Try that, it doesntmake a cloud of smokebut instead there is a giant whirlpool around you. Oh and te npcid it has is an invisible npc. so you could just type
::pnpc 2309

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to turn invisible?
